featured.text: Now you can buy tuna with the label “dolphin-free tuna.”
So in many parts of the world dolphins and fishermen are in __32__ for tuna.
They can catch thousands of tuna at one time.
Dolphins, like most of us, love to eat tuna.

other.text: They wrote letters to the tuna companies and supermarkets asking them to find a way to spare dolphins.
In the past, there wasn’t much conflict __33__ dolphins and fishermen, because the numbers of tuna in the ocean were enormous.

definition.zh_def: 金槍魚，一種大型海洋魚類，常用於食物。
definition.en_def: A large marine fish of the family Scombridae, commonly used as food.
definition.example: I ordered a tuna sandwich for lunch.
